Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its unique features and the high-quality materials used, I believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am offering this exceptional product to you for $10000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the exclusive access to our product, which is designed to exceed your expectations. I am confident that you will find this investment worthwhile. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the opportunity to serve you with our top-tier product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
